Set.Text: The Foreign Legion is the French unique unit, replacing the Great War Infantry. It receives a significant combat bonus when operating in foreign territory. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting the Volunteer Army tenet of the Freedom Ideology will grant Foreign Legion to France, instead of Great War Infantry.

Special Infantry Unit of the Modern Era. Only the French can build it or receive it by adopting the Volunteer Army tenet of the Freedom Ideology. This Unit has a combat bonus outside of friendly territory.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Volunteer Army[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]6 units are maintenance free. Receive 6 Great War Infantry units immediately.
